title: Car sales in India: Slow start in FY25 but festive season boost expected
description: Car sales grew modestly by 0.5% in the first half of FY25, with expectations for increased demand during the festive and wedding season. Two-wheeler and three-wheeler sales saw strong growth, while commercial vehicle sales declined. Overall, the industry anticipates healthy demand in the upcoming quarter.
